article_title: Out-of-shape Columbia grandmother to try to hike 2,180-mile Appalachian Trail for charity
article_text: Ad Crable is a Lancaster Newspapers staff writer and outdoors columnist who covers the environment and nuclear energy. He can be reached at acrable@lnpnews.com or (717) 481-6029. You can also follow @AdCrable on Twitter.

article_metadata.author: AD CRABLE | Staff Writer

og.description: Brenda Petroski, 60, says God called her to do arduous hike to help children in Africa.
